#rule=rule8
#rules=[{"Message Size":{"operation":"greater than","value":"10000"}},{"From":{"operation":"is","value":"*from*"}}]
#rulesJoinOperator="or"
#disabled=true
#actions={"Mirror to":"to@mail.ru"}
#if anyof(size :over 10000,
#         header :contains "From" "from") {
#    redirect "to@mail.ru";
#}
